meanings.definition: A type of antelope found in Africa.
meanings.sent1: The kobs grazed peacefully in the savanna.
meanings.sent2: I saw a herd of kobs running across the grasslands.
meanings.sent3: The kobs played tag with each other in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The graceful kobs moved like dancers in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the kobs leaping over the bushes was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'kob'.
meanings.sent1: There are many kobs in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The kobs in the exhibit looked healthy and happy.
meanings.sent3: The children counted the kobs in the picture book.
meanings.sent4: The kobs on the page seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a beautiful scene with colorful kobs.

meanings.definition: To engage in a playful or lively manner.
meanings.sent1: The children kobsed around in the playground.
meanings.sent2: The puppies kobsed with a ball in the yard.
meanings.sent3: The friends kobsed around, laughing and joking.
meanings.sent4: The dancers kobsed across the stage with joy.
meanings.sent5: The students kobsed happily during recess.
